column1: <table width="400" align="center" border="0" bgcolor="#000000" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="text-align:center; color:#FFFFFF">
As a University we are immensely proud of our academic achievements but there is a great deal more to us. We are a new University
column2: one with a long history and have quickly become one of Scotland's leading Universities
column3: highly ranked for our academic performance and with a talented group of students and academics who make us the success we are.

column1: We place teaching and student support at the heart of the University
column2: and provide a network of Support Services to help you with all aspects of your life whilst you're at Abertay. In fact there are many good reasons to choose Abertay.

column1: The University has some of the most innovative and well-designed buildings in the UK and our Library and new Student Centre have set the standard for universities across the UK. The facilities available across our campus are excellent and we pride ourselves that we are ranked number one in the UK for our investment in IT Facilities. But its not all work and no play Dundee has some outstanding student entertainment and sport plays an important part in University life

Being a student at Abertay is a rewarding experience. Our halls of residence are of the highest quality and a place in University accommodation is given to all first year students who register by the deadline. New accommodation is planned for 2008 and has proximity to the campus
column2: ensuite facilities and internet access as its main priority.

column1: Many of our students join us through this route and go on to achieve great success in their studies and careers. You can expect to see many international students in the city too. Over 12% of our students are from countries outside of Europe including India

Dundee is an outstanding place to live and study and offers an affordable lifestyle. Not only are we in a beautiful part of the world but we are Scotland's sunniest city. We hope that you will join us at a University which
column3: is committed to providing an education for the future.
